name: Mr. Abominable's Ice Age
description:
You are working for the Abominable Snowman and must retrieve a weapon to cause the ice age!

How To Play (this is all explained in game):

Click on the snowman you would like to use

Select move or attack

If you select move then click on the highlighted spot you would like to move to

if you select attack then click on the highlighted enemy you would like to attack (they highlight if they are in range)
